file_content.text: Republic = safe // M3-8Z = hero
The Shroud = danger to Republic // You = stop the Shroud
M3-8Z = monitoring for subversives
M3-8Z = scanning // Identity = confirmed // Transmission = secured
M3-8Z = scanning // Identities = confirmed // Transmission = secured
SIS encryption = designation 422 // Special Agent Riss = incoming
Glad I was able to reach you all. Deena Riss of SIS. We're in real trouble here; I'm in desperate need of your help.
Master Jedi, it's an honor. Deena Riss of SIS. I've seen holos of you on the warpath. We could really use that drive of yours here.
Deena Riss of SIS. I come to you, Master Jedi, in the hopes that your wisdom and experience can serve us in this time of need.
Deena Riss of SIS. We're in a bad way here. We really need Havoc Squad. We need you, Major.
Deena Riss of SIS. Captain, with your familiarity with the underworld, your reputation for success--you're exactly the one I need right now.
Deena Riss of SIS. Am I glad I could reach you. We've got a major situation brewing here. I desperately need your help.
We're after a rogue element who plans to strike major Republic interests. It will happen soon, and it will be catastrophic.
I'm always ready to defend the Republic from its enemies. Tell me how I can help.
Happy to help the Republic.
Knowing the one who stopped the Sith Emperor is on my side--you have no idea how relieved I am.
Tell me how I can help the SIS, and I will gladly do so.
I serve at your pleasure.
That means a lot, coming from an esteemed Jedi such as yourself.
Ready when you are. Just tell me what I need to know to stop it.
Then there's no time to waste.
I knew I could count on you, Major. Agents still beam over your destruction of the Gauntlet....
Whoa, now. I don't know anything about any strikes or interests or any rogue anythings.
I have nothing to do with it.
You're not a suspect, Captain. You're our best chance of stopping this madman.
Who is it we're talking about? Do you have a name?
What rogue element?
We do have a name. And more.
Point me to this "element." I'll make sure it doesn't hurt anyone.
Not if we strike first.
Believe me, if it was that easy, it'd be done by now. We don't need simple brute force; we need you.
There's little else I should say over holo. Our adversary has eyes and ears everywhere. Besides, I have something you'll need. A special device.
Come meet me in person--and please hurry.
M3-8Z = greeting hero // You = hero
